title: How to become a critical resource in an IT company - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.Build Credibility. People should trust that if they reach out to you their problem is solved. Be persistent in building creditibility. 2. Save the URLs of all important documents and phone numbers of help desks. Most important, share this information with those in need. 3. Learn all productivity tips, such as shortcuts in IDEs. 4. Stay in the same project/account for a long time like 3 to 4 years at least. 5. Remember the minute details about your application/project. 6. Share your knowledge and learn new things continuously. 7. Build things hands-on. Hands-on people are considered critical during crisis situation. 8. Be in the good looks of important people
